EmailTemplate.name: $15,000 off Turbonomic for State and Local Institutions (1494870665.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: $15,000 off Turbonomic for State and Local Institutions (1494870665.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kevin, I’m reaching out with a special offer for State and Local Government organizations as we approach the summer months. I’ve worked with a number of governmental institutions including the Department of Energy – Energy Information Administration, and National Science Foundation to alleviate their IT infrastructure management challenges. They generally run within a July budget cycle and occasionally have remaining funds towards the end of their fiscal year. I typically find these customers bear one of two prevalent problems: - Their IT environments are highly fragmented, marked by high inefficiency and/or their staff is limited, thinly spread and under-resources. - Their staff is limited, thinly spread and under-resources. Turbonomic directly addresses both of these challenges. With that in mind, we’d like to offer a $15,000 discount for any deal with us, if you install Turbonomic’s autonomic performance platform before the end of May. Do you have 30 minutes for my team and I to provide an introduction to you and the team at City of Alexandria over the next couple of weeks? Best regards, Going to Cisco Live? Meet with a Turbonomic Executive <[[https://turbonomic.com/leadership-meetings]]> James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
